fields.name: esdi detail
fields.short_description: EcoSocial Dynamics International (ESDI) is a USA-based private consultancy company that advises governments, international organizations, and private corporations in the Horn of Africa (HoA)
fields.long_description:
EcoSocial Dynamics International (ESDI) is a USA-based private consultancy company that advises governments, international organizations, and private corporations 
in the Horn of Africa (HoA) on how to improve the livelihood of the peoples of the region. Based on hard data, the region has many favorable eco-social systems that can comfortably 
sustain the population. However, despite its natural endowments, the HoA is one of the most inhospitable regions in the world.


The Horn of Africa is a tapestry of ecology and cultures that have traditionally complemented one another. In recent years new faulty lines have appeared in the tapestry—i.e., worsening state-society relations, dwindling resources, tribal wars, terrorism, and mass displacement of peoples. Left unaddressed for so many years, these have severely reduced the habitability of the HoA. Mass migration and internal displacement of peoples are common occurrences.
